properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 2:47AM MST until January 17 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...West Central Utah and Southwest Utah.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong cross winds are expected along West to East
routes, becoming potentially hazardous to those operating high
profile vehicles or those towing trailers. Gusty winds could
blow around unsecured objects. Wind sensitive operations will be
affected.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to become gusty late
this afternoon and evening, peak late tonight and early Friday
morning, before diminishing. Blowing snow will be possible as
well, potentially reducing visibility.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY
